( 3 ) Does low-dose ( 0.6 mg/kg ) intravenous ( i.v . ) recombinant tissue plasminogen activator ( rtPA ) reduce risk symptomatic intracerebral haemorrhage ( sICH ) ? The BP intensity arm study ongoing .
